page.title: 10Future Employment in Newent
page.content: The latest unemployment figures for the Newent area is 180. Two major attempts are being made to resolve this situation. In the first the local M.P. Mr. Paul Marland has been approached by the Town Council to ask the Department of the Environment to provide a part-time {Jobcentre}in Newent. This has met with partial success and the directors of the Good News Centre in the High Street have allowed a display of job vacacies. Secondly there should be{light {industrial development}in the area bearing in mind that this is the centre of population for the district and there is easy access to the M50 motorway. At present Newent is not included in the latest rural development plan by the Forest of Dean District Council but there is hope.
